cards.name: Consulate Baron
cards.text: When Consulate Baron enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn and creatures you don't control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.flavor: "Your refusal to submit to testing cannot be overlooked — for free, that is."
cards.name: Corrupt Lieutenant
cards.text:
It is against the law for an opponent to cast no spells during his or her turn.
Justice — At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent broke any laws since the beginning of your last turn, that opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

cards.name: Galvanic Investiture
cards.text: At the beginning of combat on each turn, you may have target artifact you control become an artifact creature with base power and toughness 5/5 until end of turn. It gains haste until end of turn.

cards.name: Garuda Windmaster
cards.text:
Flying
Whenever another creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, Garuda Windmaster gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
You may cast creature spells with flying as though they had flash.

cards.name: Naga Spymaster
cards.text:
Deathtouch
Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less deals combat damage to a player, that player may pay 2 life. If they don't, you draw a card.

cards.name: Outland Apex
cards.text:
Haste
Raid — At the beginning of your end step, Outland Apex's owner shuffles it into his or her library unless you attacked with a creature this turn.

cards.name: Ruthless Collector
cards.text: When Ruthless Collector enters the battlefield, recharge, then each player sacrifices a nonland permanent. (To recharge, create a colorless Canister artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Untap target permanent. Activate this ability only during your turn.")

cards.name: Ruzzio and Aziria
cards.text:
Double strike, trample
Whenever Ruzzio and Aziria deals combat damage to a player, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

cards.text:
Prowess
Whenever Siv Katari, Rebel Technician attacks, create a tapped and attacking X/X colourless Golem artifact creature token with prowess, where X is Siv Katari's power. Exile that token at end of combat.

cards.flavor: "Our passion will take us far, but only by working together can we hope to topple the consulate."
cards.name: Siv's Lieutenant
cards.text:
When Siv's Lieutenant enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain haste until end of turn.
Whenever you revolt, untap all creatures you control.

cards.name: Suljet, the Cog Mind
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, scry X, where X is the number of artifacts you control.
Whenever another artifact enters the battlefield under your control, put a research counter on Suljet, the Cog Mind. Then, if Suljet has ten or more research counters on it, you win the game.

cards.text: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Its controller loses 1 life.

Trample
